function.name: remove_duplicates
function.description: Removes exact duplicates from a given playlist and optionally handles similar tracks.

playlist_id.description: Unique identifier for the playlist (playlist URL, URI, or ID) from which to remove duplicates

include_similar.description: Flag indicating whether to include similar tracks in the removal process (not yet implemented)

remove_similar_automatically.description: Flag indicating whether to remove duplicates automatically (not yet implemented)

function.name: exit_application
function.description: Exits the application with a thank you message when user implies they want to leave.
